Paste Text

All of the typical text editor ways of pasting text are also found in RText. First, either cut or copy some text. Move the cursor to the location at which you would like to paste the text. Then, do any of the following:

  1. Click on the Paste button on the Toolbar.
  2. Go to the Edit menu, then select Paste.
  3. Press Ctrl+V (or whatever shortcut you have defined for this action).
  4. Right-click in the current document, then select Paste from the popup menu.
